name: Have you heard... ?
description:
"Have you heard... ?" features different personalities (Trump, Bolsonaro, your average crazy anti-vaxxer, etc) that the players have to embody. Several players join the same Uber car and talk to the driver about recent news. But missing the crucial information, you have to fill in the ______ blanks!

"Have you heard... ?" wants to raise awareness of fake news, how they occur and how they spread. Think of the best fake news and earn points from your fellow players!

This conceptual prototype was made during the 48h Hackathon - Todos versus Fakes at the Goethe Institut. Team members are:

  • Julio Blay
  • Marina Merlin
  • Simone Ferreira
  • Hamza Lari
  • Jana Reinhardt
  • Friedrich Hanisch

This concept was created with Figma!
